summary: Iteration 4 frontend testing completed. CTA marketing banner verified working on Portfolio page (both connected and disconnected states). All 5 tab navigation working correctly. Copy buttons code reviewed and properly implemented with expo-clipboard. Note: Copy buttons and notifications features only render in connected wallet state - cannot fully test without Phantom wallet extension.
critical_code_review_comments: CTA banner correctly implemented with gradient background, correct French text
Copy buttons use expo-clipboard with proper error handling and fallback
All tab navigation functional with correct content
data-testid attributes present but may not render in React Native Web DOM
test_credentials: No auth required - wallet connection needed for copy button testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features verified. CTA banner shows 'Acheter des Quantum', '50% du prix de listing', 'Listing 1er Juin 2026'. CTA click navigates to /presale. Copy buttons (portfolio wallet chip, affiliation code/link, profile wallet) are coded correctly but require wallet connection to test. Notifications section in profile requires wallet connection to view.

cta_banner_portfolio_disconnected.details: CTA banner visible at top of Portfolio page with gradient background, 'OFFRE LIMITÉE' badge, 'Acheter des Quantum' title, '50% du prix de listing • Listing 1er Juin 2026' subtitle

cta_banner_click_navigation.details: Clicking CTA banner navigates to /presale page correctly

tab_navigation.details: All 5 tabs (Portfolio, Invest, Pre-Sale, Referral, Account) navigate correctly and show expected content

portfolio_copy_wallet_button.details: Copy button with copy-outline icon implemented on wallet chip (line 236), requires connected state to be visible

affiliation_copy_buttons.details: Copy buttons for referral code and link implemented (data-testid: copy-link-btn, referral-code-display, share-btn), require connected state

profile_copy_wallet_button.details: Copy button implemented (lines 124-130 and 216), requires connected state to be visible

profile_notifications_expand_collapse.details: Notifications section with expand/collapse toggle implemented (lines 239-299), requires connected state

text_content.title: Acheter des Quantum
text_content.subtitle: 50% du prix de listing • Listing 1er Juin 2026

copy_functionality.fallback: Shows content in alert if clipboard fails

tab_navigation.invest: Shows AI Opportunities with investment cards
tab_navigation.presale: Shows QUANTUM Pre-Sale form with progress bar
tab_navigation.account: Shows Wallet Non Connecté with connect button
